body: These short, blunt sticks are held in the hands to enhance unarmed martial techniques and secured by a cord looped over the thumb. They provide the wielder with the ability to lock an opponent and target pressure points, granting you a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks to grapple.
name: Dan Bong
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Weapons/Weapon Descriptions/Dan Bong
